resources:
QuizXm 1Z0-102 Settings 1. Which of these two are the part of WEB-INF in typical web applications: web.xml classes META-INF Enterprise Application Files
2. Developer asked you to install all the Examples which come with WebLogic. Which type of installation you choose: choose typical installation choose custom installation console installationSilent installation Silent installation
3.Which two statements are true about java EE shared libraries? A shared library cannot be deployed to a cluster. An application that is targeted to server1 can use a shared library that is targeted to server 2. Multiple versions of the same shared library can be deployed and be active at the same time A shared library is referenced through an applications deployment descriptor
4.You use the Start button in the administration console to start managed2 successfully. Which two statements must be true? Managad2 is part of a cluster The Administration Server is running Managed2 has applications deployed to it The Node Manager for machine2 is configured and running.
5.An EJB application is targeted to a cluster. Remote EJB clients can therefore take advantage of WebLogic Serverâ€™s load balancing and failover capabilities. However, a proxy server exists between the clients and the cluster, which performs IP address translation. Which cluster attribute should you modify to ensure that load balancing and failover work correctly? Multicast Address Persistent Store Cluster Address Migration Basis
6.You run the default start manage Weblogic (.cmd in Windows) script as shown here: startmanageWeblogic.sh server1 http://192.168.1.102:8001. What does this do? It starts the administration server named server1, which is running at 192.168.1.102.8001 It starts the managed server named server1, which is running at 192.168.1.102.8001 It starts the managed server named server1 whose Node Manager is running at 192.168.1.102.8001 It starts the Managed Server named server1 whose Administration Server is running at 192.168.1.102:8001.
QuizXm 1Z0-102 QuizXm 1Z0-102 QuizXm 1Z0-102 QuizXm 1Z0-102 QuizXm 1Z0-102 QuizXm 1Z0-102
